On May 16 , 2014 , Indonesia through its Ministry of Foreign Affairs had submitted an official statement about the escalated crisis between Vietnam and China related to the South China Sea .

The crisis between the two countries had escalated last week after some demonstrations held by Vietnamese to protest China 's maneuvers in the South China Sea had turned violent and resulted in riots , which led to deaths and caused injuries to several others .
